name: Commando Forces: Shoot Enermy
description:
Commando Forces: Shoot Enermy combines the adrenaline of platform-style games with the action of 2d shooters

Features of the game:
- Game play smooth, rich sound...
- Lots of enemies to fight (trooper, soliders, army, tank, plane, boss ...)
- Game play retro and amazing.
- Simple controls which can be enjoyed by everyone.
- Best shooting game
